title: inidE vandaruLvAn kandan
sahitya:
inidE vandaruLvAn kandan ennArumukhan 


anupallavi

  munnai nAn seida puNNiyamO anri munnOr sei narppaNiyin payanO yAdum vArAd-


caraNam    vandiDuvAi enradum vaNNamayil Eri varuvAn sendUr uraiyum selvan
innalgaL Edumillai avanai ninaindAl ena teLindiDuvEn ennai yAr marandAlum maravAd-
